title: $:/plugins/tg/tabstory
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/button": { "created": "20150625135856196", "text": "<$fieldmangler tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/storylist"> <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/storylist]tag[$:/tags/AboveStory]]"> <$button message="tm-remove-tag" tooltip="Hide tab story" param="$:/tags/AboveStory" class=<>> {{$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/image-tabstory-on}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text="tab story"/> <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/storylist]!tag[$:/tags/AboveStory]]"> <$button message="tm-add-tag" tooltip="Show tabstory" param="$:/tags/AboveStory" class=<>> {{$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/image-tabstory-off}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text="tab story"/> ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/button", "tags": "$:/tags/PageControls", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20200323104032262", "description": "Toggle tab story on/off", "creator": "TonGerner", "caption": "{{$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/image-tabstory-on}} tab story" }, "$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/icon": { "created": "20160109171340224", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "", "type": "image/svg+xml", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/icon", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229181313572" }, "$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/image-tabstory-off": { "created": "20150625140236851", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/image-tabstory-off", "tags": "$:/tags/Image", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229181335184" }, "$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/image-tabstory-on": { "created": "20150808124502963", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/image-tabstory-on", "tags": "", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229181350096" }, "$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/license": { "created": "20180124181152090", "text": "[[Tabstory plugin|http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_playground.html]] © Ton Gerner — 2018-2023 MIT License: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT ", "creator": "TonGerner", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/license", "tags": "", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20221228112009573" }, "$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/readme": { "created": "20150803183926248", "text": "Alternative to my [[Tiddlersbar plugin|http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_playground.html]], based on the work of [[Rich Rath (rcrath)|https://github.com/rcrath/TW5-TabStory/issues]].
Here the 'breadcrumbs' are on top of the story-river. It works best in Zoomin view. <<< ''Note:''
''This plugin needs my $:/plugins/tg/layout plugin for general layout settings (available at http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_playground.html).'' <<< Settings for the layout can be found in ''~ControlPanel > Appearance > [[Plugin tweaks|$:/plugins/tg/layout/tweaks]]''. ", "creator": "TonGerner", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/readme", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20221228112059292" }, "$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/settings": { "created": "20160111172043170", "text": "!!~TabStory settings @@.brown ''Toggle tabstory in ~PageControls''@@
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/button" tag="$:/tags/PageControls"> Button active @@.brown ''Toggle tabstory in ~ViewToolbar ''@@
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/button" tag="$:/tags/ViewToolbar"> Button active <> <> <> <> <> <> <> <>
<> ", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/settings", "tags": "$:/tags/plugin-tweaks", "order": "8", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20221228112312156", "creator": "TonGerner", "caption": "Tabstory" }, "$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/settings-help": { "text": "|Entry |Description |Default |h |Toggle tabstory in ~PageControls|Toggle tabstory button in ~PageControls| | |Toggle tabstory in ~ViewToolbar|Toggle tabstory button in ~ViewToolbar| | |Background color 'tabs' |Background color of tabs |#E0E0E0 | |Hover background color 'tabs' |Background hover color of tabs |#666666 | |Font size 'tabs' |Font size of text on tabs | 0.9em | |Text color 'tabs' |Text color of tabs |#888888 | |Hover text color 'tabs' |Hover text color of tabs |#FFFFFF | |Text color '''×''' |Text color of '''×''' |#CCCCCC | |Hover text color '''×''' |Hover text color of '''×''' |#000000 | |Rounded corners 'Breadcrumbs' |Rounded upper corners of breadcrumbs | 3px |", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/settings-help", "tags": "", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229190917934", "creator": "TonGerner", "created": "20150804093256942" }, "$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/styles": { "text": "
/* STYLES STORYTABS */
.tc-story-tabs a {
     white-space: nowrap;
     display: inline-block;
}

.story-backdrop a {
     font-size: {{!!tabs-font-size}};
     background-color: {{!!tabs-background-color}};
     padding: 0px 3px;
     border-left: 1px solid #CCC;
     border-top: 1px solid #CCC;
     border-right: 1px solid #CCC;
     border-bottom: 1px solid #CCC;
     border-top-left-radius: {{!!tabs-border-radius}};
     border-top-right-radius: {{!!tabs-border-radius}};
}

.story-backdrop a:focus {
     background-color: #F4F4F4;
     border-bottom: 1px solid #F4F4F4;
}

.story-backdrop a:hover {
     color: {{!!tabs-hover-text-color}};
     background-color: {{!!tabs-hover-background-color}};
}

.story-backdrop {
     padding-bottom: 4px;
     background-color: #FFFFFF
}

a.tc-tiddlylink {
     color: {{!!tabs-text-color}};
}

html .tc-x {
     font-size: {{!!tabs-font-size}};
     color: {{!!x-text-color}};
     margin-left: 4px;
     margin-right: 10px;
}

.tc-x:hover {
     color: {{!!x-hover-text-color}};
     font-weight: bold;
}
", "x-text-color": "#CCCCCC", "x-hover-text-color": "#000000", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/styles", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "tabs-text-color": "#888888", "tabs-hover-text-color": "#FFFFFF", "tabs-hover-background-color": "#666666", "tabs-font-size": "0.9em", "tabs-border-radius": "3px", "tabs-background-color": "#E0E0E0", "modified": "20191229190103896", "created": "20191229182635413" }, "$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/storylist": { "text": "
<$list filter="[list[$:/StoryList]]"><$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/><$button message="tm-close-tiddler" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-x">×
", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/tabstory/storylist", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20221228112332109", "created": "20191229183003085", "tags": "$:/tags/AboveStory" } } }
author: TonGerner
creator: TonGerner
name: Tabstory
